Topic.Title: How does "Execute as if it were typed by player"? Work

Posts.EditableText:
Do you mean what does it do?

It does exactly what it sounds. It will perform an action as if the player had typed that command. If you want them to 'go west' or 'pick up the sword' it will do just that. It can be easier than doing these actions behind the scenes.
